msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItem.note: Pub. status: Recto; Some writing on Verso
Written in a quick but clear cursive. In a few cases of this column the scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the taxpayer.

p.note: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; almost regularly cut at the top. The papyrus is broken at the left side of the column and after the payments, yet the text is almost complete. No restoration is needed. (MA)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
